## NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D.getImageData() method

Get ImageData for the defined region of the canvas.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getImageData(sx: number, sy: number, sw: number, sh: number): IImageData;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sx | <code>number</code> | The x coordinate of the region. |
|  sy | <code>number</code> | The y coordinate of the region. |
|  sw | <code>number</code> | The width of the region. Can be negative to extend left. |
|  sh | <code>number</code> | The height of the region. Can be negative to extend up. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`IImageData`
